org.elasticsearch.gateway

Class PrimaryShardAllocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.gateway.PrimaryShardAllocator

  • public abstract class PrimaryShardAllocator
extends AbstractComponent
    The primary shard allocator allocates primary shard that were not created as a result of an API to a node that held them last to be recovered.
